title: Like terms
text: First, we identify the like terms (terms that have the same exponents).
speech: First, we identify the like terms (terms that have the same exponents).
pacedSpeech: First, we identify the like terms (terms that have the same exponents).

title: Combination
text: Then, we combine the like terms (adding the coefficient of the like terms), and get $$3^2+7x+12$$.
speech: Then, we combine the like terms (adding the coefficient of the like terms), and get  3 squared plus 7 x plus 12 .
pacedSpeech: Then, we combine the like terms (adding the coefficient of the like terms), and get   3 squared plus 7 x plus 12
